title: Poker VR
description: Multiplayer VR poker game with realistic physics and hand tracking.
shortDesc: Step into a virtual casino and experience real-time multiplayer poker with fully immersive hand-tracked gestures, avatar interactions, and lifelike physics. Built for Oculus Quest, Poker VR delivers the feel of live poker from the comfort of your home.
roles: Contributed to core gameplay development as part of the immersive VR team at Ivy Comptech.
Implemented realistic card dealing, chip stacking, and gesture recognition using Oculus hand tracking.
Built smooth multiplayer table synchronization with avatar gestures, player seating, and round logic.
Optimized rendering, lighting, and interaction feedback for low-latency VR play on Oculus Quest.
Collaborated closely with designers and animators to ensure accurate visual and haptic responses.
Developed robust session state handling to support reconnects, network drops, and idle players.
Tested VR locomotion, camera transitions, and interaction fidelity across seated and room-scale modes.

contributions.name: Core Poker Mechanics
contributions.shortDesc: Built the real-time poker logic and immersive table interaction systems.
details: Implemented Texas Holdâ€™em rule logic including betting rounds, blinds, raises, and folds.
Synced card reveals, chip animations, and winner resolution across all players in a session.
Created round management with dealer control, countdown timers, and hand resets.
Handled spectator view and AI fallback in case of player disconnection.

contributions.name: Hand Tracking & Interaction
contributions.shortDesc: Integrated Oculus hand tracking for natural gesture-driven gameplay.
details: Mapped gestures to real-world interactions: chip throw, card peek, raise motion.
Created collider-based interaction zones for card pickup, betting gestures, and table taps.
Provided haptic feedback and audio cues based on proximity and object weight.
Maintained responsiveness under variable hand-tracking conditions using fallback logic.

contributions.name: Multiplayer Synchronization
contributions.shortDesc: Enabled stable multiplayer tables with live voice, avatars, and actions.
details: Used Photon networking to sync seat positions, avatar gestures, bets, and game state.
Built player join/leave flow with rejoin handling and host migration.
Integrated voice chat and positional audio per player with mute controls.
Ensured smooth replication of all major actions with lag compensation and animation syncing.

contributions.name: Visual Polish & VR UX
contributions.shortDesc: Enhanced realism through interaction feedback and environmental immersion.
details: Designed virtual casino environments with ambient lighting and reflections.
Implemented avatar lip sync, gaze direction, and proximity reactions.
Optimized shader performance and poly count for Oculus Quest hardware.
Added cinematic camera options for replays, highlights, and tutorials.
